metadata.description:
In April of 2020, separated by an ocean and 3000 miles, both of us went into self-isolation. Physically, of course -- like everyone else. But also musically.

Turning inwards, we scoured the Refs instrumental vault for our most menacing, introverted and brooding soundscapes -- and proceeded to write 12 songs in 12 days. 2 years later, we offer up our debut album, "New Religion".

We wrote the title track for this album so quickly that we’re still having trouble wrapping our minds around what it means. This was an exercise in getting the hidden contents of our brain’s id out in recorded form.

The animated image we chose for artwork is a taste of an unreleased "New Religion" themed collectable project. Owners of our sound.xyz NFTs will get advanced access to the mint.

lyrics.text:
will you choke me please?
like they do on the computer screen I don’t wanna breathe
just wanna feel seen
I like feeling helpless
helps me forget my hopelessness my scattered brain wiped clean am I surviving?
love me like a knife I’ll do whatever you want me to do
tell me exactly what you want from me I don’t wanna choose
need some new commandments ‘cause I’ve just about run out of faith fill me with your demons my heart’s begging for a new religion
tell me what you hate about me I’ll do my best to change
had other plans for today
but I can rearrange
I’ll come and go quickly
you don’t have to hold me
just want you to fuck me
then act like you don’t know me
love me like a knife I’ll do whatever you want me to do
tell me exactly what you want from me I don’t wanna choose
need some new commandments ‘cause I’ve just about run out of faith fill me with your demons my heart’s begging for a new religion

metadata.name: New Religion #1
metadata.title: New Religion
